duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct vehicle inspections at various locations including dealerships, physical auctions, off-site locations, and consumer residences.
Complete vehicle condition inspections and related reporting, including interior/exterior assessments, repair/replacement estimates, and documentation.
Identify and assess structural damage, frame condition, alignment of vehicle body panels, and detect missing parts and mechanical problems.
List inspected wholesale vehicles on the auction platform and interface with customers to develop strong relationships.
Travel to inspect vehicles, collaborate with management, and educate clients on products and services available.
Work independently and in a team environment, with flexible availability including weekends and occasional evenings.
Sign up independent dealerships as buyers to utilize the digital platform.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Automotive Technology, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
